definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan

sentences.english: Troops are concentrating south of the river.
Look at this. This is Moviem on the 50uth Bank in London.
sentences.chinese: 你看这个，这是位于伦敦南岸区的电影博物馆。

sentences.english: Head office is located in the scenic southern bank of Qiantang River in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 总公司座落于风景秀丽的杭州钱塘江南岸。

sentences.english: Located in the bank of Dan River that is about 13km southeast of the city proper of Jincheng.

sentences.english: That's an art gallery on the South Bank in London.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个在伦敦南岸区的美术馆。

sentences.english: Lai Wan and the new site was concentrated in the western, mainly to Coast Road and Montevideo Road.
sentences.chinese: 而新盘主要集中荔湾西部，以南岸路和康王路为主。

sentences.english: Nan'an district service outsourcing of creative industries like convention and exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 南岸区重点发展会展等创意产业服务外包。

sentences.english: Yangtse River, to the northeast of Chiayu Hupeh Province.

sentences.english: Two days later, the enemy pursuers before rushed to the south bank.
sentences.chinese: 两天以后，敌人的追兵才赶到南岸。

sentences.english: It is across Hung Lai Road and Yan Yung Street, and is accessible from Hung Lai Road and Harbour Place.

sentences.english: Singapore, a lot of friends will remind of south island set in the merlion.

sentences.english: The Separatists chose to settle just south of the Hudson River.

sentences.english: Martin Chaplin, a chemist at London South Bank University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦南岸大学的化学家得马丁卓别林表示赞同。

sentences.english: The ship sank off the south coast of the island.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船在岛的南岸沿海沉没。

sentences.english: South of the river lies a small factory.
sentences.chinese: 一个小型工厂坐落在河的南岸。

sentences.english: It's like building the South Bank from scratch instead of letting it grow over 70 years.
sentences.chinese: 就像从头开始建立南岸，而非70年的成长。
